types:type.name: unitedFlightsRestResponse

types:type.types:shape: %dw 2.0 type initRequestAttributes = {| queryParams: {| code: String, simulate: String, airline: String |} |} {"MetadataFormat": "json", "example": "{\"queryParams\":{\"code\":\"SFO\",\"simulate\":\"true\",\"airline\":\"american\"}}"}
